VRPoseAngularVelocity.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The angularVelocity read-only property of the interface returns an array representing the angular velocity vector of the at the current timestamp, in radians per second.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: In other words, the current velocity at which the sensor is rotating around the x, y, and z axes.

VRPoseAngularVelocity.value: A , or null if the VR sensor is not able to provide angular velocity information.
